title: SLR
text: This book is a guideline for researchers who are already familiar with Systematic Literature review to some extent and want to further refine their knowledge on enhancing the quality and accuracy of their Systematic Literature Review.

title: Introduction
text: Systematic Literature Review (SLR) has become more increasingly popular among researchers.

title: Steps in conducting a systematic literature review
text: The systematic literature review consists of three main steps, i.e. reviewed study preparation, coding, and report writing. Each of these steps consists of several workflows.

title: Steps in conducting a systematic literature review

Author
This practical guideline is written and provided by Faisal Mustafa, a lecturer at Universitas Syiah Kuala, Indonesia, and it is delivered as an open access resource.
